name: Loprinze Aviation
about: Loprinze Aviation is a specialized flight training school located near Nashua Airport, New Hampshire, just an hour north of Boston Logan airport. We offer high-quality, standardized, and safe training with a focus on risk management and fun. Our float training programs utilize two American Champion Scouts equipped with Wipline 2100A amphibious floats, each powered by a 180 hp Lycoming O-360 engine. With a team of talented instructors, including an FAA Designated Pilot Examiner, we provide accelerated and conventional training schedules. Our training includes practical application of seaplane skills, such as planning fuel stops, managing aircraft loading, and dealing with real-world challenges. We also offer day-long adventures to Northern New England's pristine waterways, ensuring a varied and memorable experience. Our commitment to safety and excellence makes Loprinze Aviation an ideal choice for those seeking specialized flight training.
